roleset.name: attach a farnesyl group to a protein

example.name: example with instrument
example.text: N-(Ac)-CSIM was in vitro farnesylated with [3H]FPP (20 Ci/mmol) and farnesyltransferase and incubated with either mock-infected membranes (i) or reconstituted.

example.name: example with result
example.text: Preferably, the polypeptide that represents the substrate is farnesylated to a cysteine moiety.
example.arg: the polypeptide that represents the substrate
